dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 2550 IH: Protect America's Workforce Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Golden of Maine (for himself, Mr. Fitzpatrick, Mr. Norcross, Mr. LaLota, Mr. Pocan, Mr. Turner of Ohio, Mrs. Dingell, and Mr. Lawler) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To nullify the Executive Order relating to Exclusions from Federal Labor-Management Relations Programs, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Protect America's Workforce Act.

section.header: Nullification of Executive Order relating to Exclusions from Federal Labor-Management Relations Programs
section.text: The Executive order titled Exclusions from Federal Labor-Management Relations Programs, issued on March 27, 2025, shall have no force or effect and no Federal funds may be obligated or expended to carry out such Executive order.

Any collective bargaining agreement in effect as of March 26, 2025, between any executive branch Federal agency and any labor organization that is an exclusive representative of Federal employees shall have full force and effect through the stated term of the applicable agreement.
